__interviewer_situation_question_1__.text: Ask why they closed the door.

output.text: Oh, my apologies, You see, the contents of this interview are extremely sensitive and must be kept confidential under any and all circumstances.

__interviewer_situation_question_2__.text: Stay silent and wait for the interviewer to continue.

output.text: Now, let's get started, shall we?
First of all, I must say, I am extremely impressed wit your resume.
You eye your resume nervously and start wondering if there was some sort of mistake.
The Interviewer noticies your discomfort and smiles mysteriously at you before continuing.
I mean, 37 wins and only one loss, that's quite impressive, specially for an illegal underground fighting club.
We have done our research on you, ofcourse.
Infact, we have been watching you for quite some time now.

__interviewer_situation_question_3__.text: Ask how they know all that.

output.text: As I said-we have been watching you for quite some time now.
We know everything about you, from your childhood to your most recent activities.
We know about your time in the underground fighting club, we know about your wins and losses, we know about your skills and abilities.
We know everything there is to know about you.

__interviewer_situation_question_4__.text: Ask what they want from you.

output.text: Hey! This is about as far as the game has been made.
Please let me know if you enjoyed it thus far!.
It would really mean a lot to me if you gave me feedback!
